metadata.name: Workflow for: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shan...
metadata.description: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai with high cost performance, preferably departing in the afternoon.
metadata.question_pattern: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai with high cost performance, preferably departing in the afternoon.

nodes.name: flight_search
nodes.description: Search for flight options and prices from LAX to PVG with a preference for afternoon departure.

nodes.name: cost_analysis
nodes.description: Analyze the flight options to find the best cost performance.

nodes.name: preference_matcher
nodes.description: Match the analyzed flight options with user preferences.

nodes.name: result_summarizer
nodes.description: Summarize the matched flight options and provide recommendations.

inputs.user_question: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai

nodes.name: user_query
nodes.description: Ask user for additional information like travel date or budget.

inputs.question: What is your preferred travel date?

nodes.name: flight_booking
nodes.description: Book the selected flight after user confirms.

shared_store_schema.travel_date: The date of travel chosen by the user
shared_store_schema.selected_flight: The flight option selected by the user
